page.title: 06GOING TO SCHOOL IN TICKHILL
page.content: School begins at 9am,and finishes at 3.45pm, Monday to Friday.Lunch is from 11.55 am until 1.15 pm.School dinners cost 60 pence per day.There are two 15 minute breaks,one at 10.30 am and one at 2.30 pm.Pupils study a variety of {subjects}including maths,English, science,enviromental studies,French, computer studies,P.E.and art.At our school there are eight classes each with its own teacher who teaches all subjects.The top two years are taught some subjects by{specialists.}There is a computer,a television,a video,and a music centre to help with lessons.All work is recorded in exercise books or folders for future reference.A variety of{musical instruments}is available for pupils to learn to play.Each middle school class has a weeks residential visit each year and every class often goes on day visits.
